text: maryam ka putr maseehî€¼ isake siva kuchh nahin ki vah ek rasool hai, usase pahale bhee bahut-se rasool ho chuke hain, usakee maan sachchee thee, donon bhojan karate the, aap dekhen ki ham kaise unake lie nishaaniyaan (ekeshvaravaad ke lakshan) ujaagar kar rahe hain, phir dekhie ki ve kahaan bahake[1] ja rahe hain
